description: SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces The Ultimate Creative Builder for Little Engineers! Get ready for an explosion of fun and learning with the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set, designed to ignite the imaginations of your little ones aged one and up! This isn't just any building toy; it's a gateway to endless discovery and a fantastic way for the whole family to bond through play. Inside this generous set, you'll find a treasure trove of 100 vibrant, engaging pieces that are perfectly sized for tiny hands. Imagine the incredible creations you can build with 48 short bars, 8 wonderfully curved bars that add dynamic flow to your designs, and 18 long bars for grander structures. To bring your visions to life, there are 26 sturdy magnetic balls that connect everything with satisfying clicks, making building a breeze and wonderfully safe. But the fun doesn't stop there! This set comes with a super-sturdy storage container that’s more than just a place to keep your pieces tidy. Oh no, this container is a building surface in itself! Both the lid and the bottom are cleverly designed with unique building grids, providing a fantastic foundation and a clear starting point for constructing your first marvelous creations or adding extra levels to your existing masterpieces. The included colorful building guides are packed with inspiring ideas and a range of amazing models to get you started, helping young builders learn as they play and experiment with different shapes and connections. This hands-on experience promotes essential developmental skills like problem-solving, spatial reasoning, and fine motor control, all while keeping the mood light and joyful. The magnetic connections are a marvel, allowing for effortless assembly and disassembly, so your little architect can rebuild and redesign their dreams as often as they like. Whether you're looking for an engaging activity for a rainy day, a stimulating educational tool for the playroom, or a wonderful gift that keeps on giving, the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set is an absolute winner. It’s designed to grow with your child, offering new challenges and creative opportunities as they get older and their building ambitions expand. Dive into a world of colorful construction, where every magnetic connection brings you closer to a finished marvel, and every playtime session is an adventure in learning and family fun. This set encourages collaborative play, allowing siblings or parents and children to work together, share ideas, and celebrate their collective achievements. The bright colors and satisfying tactile experience of the pieces make it an irresistible invitation to explore and build. It’s more than just a toy; it’s a tool for fostering creativity, encouraging critical thinking, and creating precious family memories, one magnetic build at a time.

The Ultimate SmartMax set for the classroom or the bedroom! SmartMax Build & Learn features 100 building pieces and a container that is a sturdy storage unit - and much more! Both the lid and the bottom of the container each offer unique building grids to help you on your way to building original and colourful structures. Colourful building guides are also included. Age: 1+ Inside the box Contains 100 pieces:- 48 short bars 8 curved bars 18 long bars 26 magnetic balls and 2 colourful instruction guides with a range of models.

Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium.

  
 * This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. 
 * Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. 
 * Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go.

title: Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
Planetarium Projector
description: Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

description:
Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations!
 Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

title: Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
Planetarium Projector
description: Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

title: Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
Planetarium Projector
description: Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Transform your bedroom into a planetarium! This motor-driven planetarium uses lights and motion to bring our Solar System to life as the 8 planets orbit the Sun. The ultra-bright 1000-hour light used in the Sun, together with its black base, produces truly spectacular results in a darkened room.

 A fun, sensory way to build fine motor skills and basic life skills (zipping up clothes, putting on belts etc) as well as encourage language development and discussion. Suitable for 2+ years.

 Lifeskills Board - product features:

description:
Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations!
 Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Transform your bedroom into a planetarium! This motor-driven planetarium uses lights and motion to bring our Solar System to life as the 8 planets orbit the Sun. The ultra-bright 1000-hour light used in the Sun, together with its black base, produces truly spectacular results in a darkened room.

description:
Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations!
 Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

description:
Transform your bedroom into a planetarium! This motor-driven planetarium uses lights and motion to bring our Solar System to life as the 8 planets orbit the Sun. The ultra-bright 1000-hour light used in the Sun, together with its black base, produces truly spectacular results in a darkened room.

 The planets are marked with symbols for ease of identification and the 4-way switch allows you to turn on the light and the motor together or independently. The longitude markings on the base let you arrange the planets in their correct positions on specific days with the help of the chart in the guide booklet.

 The Geosafari Solar System and Planetarium is really two astronomy discovery projects in one. Fit the Star Dome over the light to project a starscape on the walls and ceiling, with all the major constellations labelled.

 The guide booklet is packed with useful information about our Solar System, together with suggestions for fun activities.

 Contents:

  
 * Central Tower 
 * 8 planets 
 * 8 metal rods to attach planets to the central tower 
 * Sun sphere 
 * Northern hemisphere star dome 
 * Krypton bulb  Requires 4 AA batteries, supplied separately

 Age 8+

description:
Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations!
 Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

  
 * Introductory mechanical engineering kit for ages three and up 
 * Build six awesome models 
 * Large plastic tools are perfect for small hands and safe to use 
 * Building pieces are compatible with components from other Kids First early engineering kits 
 * Full-color, eight-page manual includes clear and detailed step-by-step assembly instructions 
 * Unique and engaging way to introduce simple engineering concepts to young children 
 * Develops fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills 
 * Endless possibilities for open-ended creative play 
 * Age 3+

title: Geosafari Motorized Solar System
Geosafari Motorized Solar System | Learning Resources | BrightMinds UK
description:
Transform your bedroom into a planetarium! This motor-driven planetarium uses lights and motion to bring our Solar System to life as the 8 planets orbit the Sun. The ultra-bright 1000-hour light used in the Sun, together with its black base, produces truly spectacular results in a darkened room.

 The planets are marked with symbols for ease of identification and the 4-way switch allows you to turn on the light and the motor together or independently. The longitude markings on the base let you arrange the planets in their correct positions on specific days with the help of the chart in the guide booklet.

 The Geosafari Solar System and Planetarium is really two astronomy discovery projects in one. Fit the Star Dome over the light to project a starscape on the walls and ceiling, with all the major constellations labelled.

 The guide booklet is packed with useful information about our Solar System, together with suggestions for fun activities.

 Contents:

  
 * Central Tower 
 * 8 planets 
 * 8 metal rods to attach planets to the central tower 
 * Sun sphere 
 * Northern hemisphere star dome 
 * Krypton bulb  Requires 4 AA batteries, supplied separately

 Age 8+
